elements.title: Strange Monument
elements.description: A short graphic novel on the “ein meile von Berlin” column by Arthur Nihoul, created during Storylab of the  Collaborative Atlases lab.
elements.category-description: To collect personal perspective and voices, oral histories, interviews and documentations.

elements.title: Nachtbuergermeister Infopunkt - Regenbogenkiez
elements.description: The Nachtbürgermeister, and the Tiny House adapted to Information Point are to be found in one of the nightlife hotspots of the Regenbogenkiez. Active certain nights of the week, the activity of the Nachtbürgermeister is allegedly that of mediating amongst conflicting interests of residents, visitors, tourists and other interested parties. The physical presence of the Nachtbürgermeister at the designated tiny house built by the Tempelhof-Schöneberg Bezirkamt is complemented by the mobile presence of the Nachtlichte, volunteers dressed in white that provide support whilst roaming across the areas of the thriving Schöneberg’s nightlife.
elements.category-description: Projects, initiatives, actions devoted to solidarity and mutual care

elements.title: Museum der Unerhörten Dingen
elements.description: The Museum of Unheard Things is a  Cabinet of Curiosities curated by Roland Albrecht, located in Crellestraße. The museum displays unique objects and their unheard (of) stories, all categorized according to weight
elements.category-description: Venues, building, public spaces, locations that convey memories, feelings or emotions in the neighbourhood
